form.name: suspected_symptomatic_hiv_infection_unlikely
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC HIV Infection> Suspected symptomatic HIV infection unlikely

field.name: Suspected Symptomatic HIV Infection Unlikely | Take Action
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding according to the feeding recommendations for healthy children
Counsel mother about her own health
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for the next routine visit
Counsel mother/caregiver on other areas based on their needs and age of child
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
